content.raw: We have quite a few contact sensors in ARIAC. The sdf for the sensors doesn't use the `<always_on>` tag (because the contact sensor tutorial doesn't mention it). From what I understand, these sensors will stop working with this PR, is that right? We can update the sensors to use the `<always_on>` tag, but other users in the same situation wouldn't be aware of the change.
